text: Believe in God and His Messenger, and expend out of that which He caused to come down to you�He said:That is, what you inherited from your forefathers (ābāʾ), and your possessions (mulk). So give of what your natural selves enjoy from [this] world, in the cause of obeying Him and His Messenger. For those of you who believe and expend their whole lives in the ways that God commanded that they should expend them, will have a great reward, namely, to abide with the Everlasting (al-Bāqī) in His Garden, [enjoying] His good pleasure (riḍā).His words, Exalted is He:
